name: Gordon Mote
description: '''Gordon James Mote''' (born October 25, 1970) is an American [[Christian country music|Christian country]]/[[southern gospel]] singer, piano player, and [[Contemporary worship|worship leader]]. He was born blind. He has released eight studio albums. His album ''Don't Let Me Miss the Glory'' (2007) was his breakthrough on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' charts.
